Uruguay 1 vs. Ghana 1 in the 2010 World Cup

Game played in the 2010 World Cup, 1/4 Finals

Date: Friday, July 02, 2010

Uruguay 1 - 1 Ghana
(0-0) on extra time
4 -2 on penalties
Goals:
  45'+2' Sulley Muntari
  Diego Forlan 55'
Penalty Shootout:

Abbreviations and Notes:
Pos = Position. It shows the player's natural position but not necessarily the one he played in this particular game
Positions: GK: Goalkeeper / DF: Defender / MF: Midfielder / FW: Forward
Je. = Jersey number / (C) = Captain
